column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis programme will allow you to develop advanced knowledge of the eye, eye diseases and treatment and the research underpinning clinical practice. It is delivered by ophthalmologists, researchers and nurses who are at the forefront of ophthalmic research clinical practice at the Institute of Ophthalmology and Moorfields Eye Hospital Trust both institutions will be involved in the teaching.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
